1224590.name: End of War 1945 Soundtrack
1224590.description: Remastered recordings of military marches tuned to fit the setting of End of War 1945.  A sampling of each faction's music is included, German, American, Italian, and Yugoslav Partisan and Nationalist recordings.  All the tracks are either from restored original recordings, or modern recordings tuned to a 78 RPM feel in terms of frequency range and overall feel. If you're a fan of history, this music is an excellent way to immerse yourself in the era. Over 40 tracks included!
1224590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
